lines.romaji: Iya, meshi-oshi shita tokoro de Tsukaji-san hairu no juu-ku ji dakara kekkyoku machi ni nacchau n da yo ne.
Ima manejÄ-san ni renraku shite mou kocchi mukatte morattemasu.

Mou Tsukaji-san mukatte itadaite iru n de daijoubu desu.
Sou nan da. Ja ikeru ka.
Kyou sukejuuru ni nain desu kedo dashi ga atte.
Naruhodo. Kocchi wa maku ni koshita koto wa nai kara sa.

Hai chekku OK desu. Tsuzuite katto roku utsurimasu.
Goutou yaku no o-futari hairaremasu onegaishimasu.
Kono moodo ni naru to genba wa ikki ni maki hajimeru.
Koushite satsuei wa junchou ni maite itta.
Shikashi koko de yosougai no dekigoto ga.

>> Dou desu ka? >> Chotto jikan kakarisou desu ne.
(Kameraman) Shige-chan, kore sa kikai gaku kara kicchae ba ikeru n janai?
"E kara kiru" to wa kakaku kara hazusu to iu koto.
Ikesou ssu ne. Chotto kakunin shimasu.
Kikai ga kara kicchae ba ikesou desu ga doushimashou?
Kamera-san no fine puree ni yori satsuei wa zokkou.
Dono kurai kakarisou desu ka ne?
Ah, chotto kono mama omachi itadakute mo ii desu ka?
Utagawa-san, ima Tsukaji-san ga TÅmei kara no jÅ«tai ni hamacchatta mitai n desu kedo dounika nukerarenai desu ka ne? >> TÅmei?

Etto ne, YÅga de orite, Tamagawa no dotemichi hashitte kureba sanjuppun de tsuku yo.
Toriaezu YÅga de orite itadaite ii desu ka.
YÅga de orite Tamagawa no dotemichi hashitte kureba sanjuppun de tsuku yo. Iesu!
Honrai no yotei de wa nijikan go ni genba iri suru Tsukaji-san ga kiseki no haya iri o hatashi genba no borutÄ“ji wa saikouchou
Kyouiteki na makikata de nanto sanjikan mo hayaku oeru koto ga dekita
Tada kuji zengo no densha wa sanbon ari sasuga ni dono densha ka made wa oboete inai
Ekimae de sukoshi mae kara machibuse shiyou
Souchou kara no satsuei de hetoheto na noni ashita mo hayai noni
[Kore jugyou ni kankei nai yo na?]
Anna ni kirai datta kyoushi o tasukeru tame dake ni Tokyo kara wazawazaâ€¦
Aa~ a a! Hayaku kaette ofuro ni haitte hoshitsu shite netai
Shii-chan wa? >> Watashi wa shigoto owatte kaeru tokoro.
Tashika mada Fuku-chan to wa wakarete nai hazu
Maa ongaku no hou sappari dakedo ne.
Sou ka~ maa kibishii sekai da mon ne.
Watashi wa ne mou genjitsu mite hoshii to omotten da kedo ne.
Unâ€¦ seikatsu toka ne taihen da mon ne. >> Sou.
Demo sa anma iu to kenka ni nacchau kara sa.
Sokka. >> Honto wa sa kodomo toka mo hoshii n da kedo sa.
Urete ichininmae ni naru made wa tsukurenai toka iu kara sa.
Fuku-chan tte hen na toko majime da kara ne.
Demo sa ryoushin wa au tabi ni hayaku mago no kao ga mitai toka itte kuru no yo.
Mitakongu minogasu wake ni wa ikanai shiâ€¦
Shii-chan sa sono hanashi kondo yukkuri kikasete.
Ah gomen hito mattenda yo ne?

lines.romaji: Iya nanika sa ano nee tachibanashi mo nan dakara kondo chanto soudan noritai na to omotte.
Arigatou ja mata kondo renraku suru ne.
Un wakatta jaa ne. Jaa ne mata ne.
Ogenki sou desu ne, sensei mo. >> Ou, genki genki.
Sukunakutomo kono densha ni wa nosenai you ni shinakereba ikenai.
Tachibanashi mo nan nan de anoâ€¦ soko no Gasuto de.
Ocha kaâ€¦ iyaiya ikitai no wa yamayama nandakedo.

lines.romaji: Jitsu wa sensei sa ototoshi kekkon shite ima okusan no onaka ni akachan ga iru n da yo.
Sore de kyou wa yannakya ikenai koto toka aru kara ocha wa na dekinai naa.

lines.romaji: Watashi datte ocha nanka zenzen shitakunai kedo anta no tame ni shikata naku sasotten da yo.
Watashi mo onaji densha nan desu.
Sensei tonari no sharyou no hou ga suiterun de acchi ikimasen ka? >> E?
Iikedo acchi no hou konde nai ka?
Koko yori wa suiterun de acchi ikimashou.
Kocchi no hou ga konde nai ka?
Betsu ni ii kedo gekikomi da zo kore.
(Mita) Kondou-tachi ga ita koro to chigatte ima wa sugu ni oya ga dete kite mondai ni nacchau kara taihen da yo.
Seito-tachi mo sore ga wakatteru kara sensei no koto namechatte sa.
Mukashi no chuugakusei no hou ga yoppodo sunao de kawaige ga atta yo na.
Motomoto kirai na hito no kuroubanashi mattaku kyoumi nai.
Nakanaka shuppatsu shinai na nanika toraburu kana?
Nani o yatten da yo mattaku nyarome!
Sasuga ni sawatta hito no koto wa tasukerarenai.
Koushite watashi wa san shuume mo buji Mitakongu no kyÅ«shutsu ni seikou shita.
Sore ofuro de yaru yatsu dakedo ne.
Mou minna de konakute ii yo~.

lines.romaji: Ii jan, sekkaku kita n dakara okurasete yo, nee otousan.
Iyaa saikou no tanjoubi da yo.
Watashi no wa ofuro de tsukau yatsu dakara ne. >> Mochiron ofuro demo yaru yo.
Watashi no wa ofuro de tsukaccha dame na yatsu dakara ne?
Wakatteru yo. >> Te iu ka onee-chan ga konna oyakoukou da to omowanakatta.
